Class CarbonTalon

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICarbonRampable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.livewindow.LiveWindowSendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.MotorSafety, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDOutput, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController

    public class CarbonTalon
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Talon
implements ICarbonRampable
    Our own implementation of the Talon supports the use of a CarbonRamp so that a set() call can alternately use setRamp() so that the Talon will slowly approach the set value rather than abruptly jump to it.
    Author:
    Greg Armstrong, Team 1839 Carbonauts Mentor, Nick Mosher, Team 1829 Carbonauts Captain
